intro: Pilea lindeniana, commonly known as the Chinese money plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Araceae. It is native to China and is characterized by its rosette-forming leaves that resemble small coins. The plant produces small, inconspicuous greenish-white flowers that are followed by bright red berries. It is a popular houseplant due to its attractive foliage and ease of care. Pilea lindeniana thrives in bright, indirect light and well-draining soil.
